ygData.subject: Realizations.

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>



* She looked down at herself even more as she heard Prowl speak, remembering 
what had happened but still in shock about all this which had happened.
It was all so new and strange.
Here she was with a new beast mode, but believe it or not...she didn't think 
that she could get out of it!
It almost felt as much a true part of her as her robot mode did, like her 
real form. But it was all so sudden and almost scared the slag out of her.
Here she was now, standing upright in this new mode but what was she...this 
was some sort of creature which she had never seen before.
But as she CR room doors opened she looked at her reflection in the shiny 
surface, and jumped back in surprise. What she had seen was the face of a 
nightmare, something out of a horror film thought up in a sick bot's 
imagination!
She stepped back from the doors, her voice barely a whisper.*

" I'm a monster...."

* And she was, something that could rip apart a bot in seconds and still 
feel no wavering about the action.
She didn't even know if she could ever accept her name again, hear it from 
others mouths...knowing that she was this.
She looked down at her claws again, finding them so alien she thought that 
she could be looking through something elses eyes, something bent on 
killing.
But even if she accepted this form, she couldn't go back into the CR 
room...where her hightened senses relayed that Tavatron was in there...and 
Dinobot had regained a bit of conciousness.
She couldn't let them see her like this, like a monster.

Her breathing was iragular and she forgot about the throbing pain in her 
shoulder, wondering just if her activation mode would work.
Her voice again quiet.*

" Iron Raptor Maximize!"

* Nothing happened, her muscles tensed.*

" Maximize!!"

* Still nothing.*

" MAXIMIZE GODDAM YOU!!!"

* There was a faint clicking sound within her circuits this time...but 
nothing other then that occured.
Could her activation sequence have been damaged...or was this mode 
permanent?
She remembered she had transformed the last time this had happen, when she 
had been pained.
But this time it wasn't working in the slightest.
Though, all she knew was that she wasn't going into that CR room unless she 
was physically dragged in there, and that was all she knew for sure.*
